item.title: Emote ids?
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

Not the ::emote (id) but like where it says wave,beckon, and all that. Well i know where to change wat it does, but i only ahve the line numbers for the first 8. Like i can change the text on the first 8.

sendFrame126("@red@Bank", 180);//first emote slot sendFrame126("@blu@Train",181); sendFrame126("@red@Jad", 178); sendFrame126("@blu@Cape",175); sendFrame126("@red@Shops",177); sendFrame126("@blu@PK",182); sendFrame126("@red@PKbox",185); sendFrame126("@yel@Drunk",186);
That is how i have my first 8. But like i don’t know how to change the rext for wave. It is a number at the end of them but ive tried many and can’t figure it out. Like the train emote number is 181. I can’t figure out the next couple. Please if you know them tell me.

Read full topic
